front.title: RTP payload format for Enhanced Variable Rate Narrowband-Wideband plus 2kbps Codec (EVRC-NW2K)

abstract.t: This document specifies real-time transport protocol (RTP) payload formats to be used for the Enhanced Variable Rate Narrowband-Wideband plus 2kbps Codec (EVRC-NW2K). Three media type registrations are included for EVRC-NW2K RTP payload formats. In addition, a file format is specified for transport of EVRC-NW2K speech data in storage mode applications such as e-mail.
